title: Safe food handling
creator_credit: Leigh Tilson, Victorian Film Corporation and Leigh Tilson and Associates
brief_description: Demonstrates the need for care when handling food. Disease free handlers, working with well maintained equipment is essential, otherwise food born illness can occur.
